name: testcafe-typescript
description: Boiler plate for tescafe automation framework

scripts.test:multiple: npx testcafe chrome,firefox ./tests  -s takeOnFails=true --reporter allure ; npm run generate:report
scripts.docker:run: docker run -u root -v "`pwd`/tests":/app/tests -v "`pwd`/allure":/app/allure -i testcafeimage "chromium:headless,firefox" tests/**/*.js --skip-js-errors --reporter allure
scripts.generate:report: allure generate allure/allure-results --clean -o allure/allure-report && allure open allure/allure-report

author: Puneet Punj
